# Cross-Platform Rho Implementation

## Context

This is a structural refactor to make Rho cross-platform (macOS, Linux, Android/Termux).

- **Design document**: `specs/cross-platform/design.md`
- **Implementation plan**: `specs/cross-platform/plan.md`
- **Requirements**: `specs/cross-platform/requirements.md`

## Task

Implement all 10 steps from `specs/cross-platform/plan.md` in order.

10 tasks created from specs/cross-platform/plan.md. Step 1 (git mv Android files into platforms/) is ready. Steps 2-10 follow dependency chain. Design doc: specs/cross-platform/design.md, Plan: specs/cross-platform/plan.md
Step 1 done: platforms/ dir created, all Android files git mv'd with rename tracking. Step 2 (rename termux-* to generic names) is unblocked.

Step 2 done: renamed 10 termux-* skills to generic names (clipboard, contacts, device, dialog, location, media, notification, sms, stt, tts). Git tracks all as renames. Committed 7e46112. Steps 3, 4, 5 now unblocked.
Step 3 done: created 4 macOS platform skills (notification, clipboard, open-url, tts). Committed 9e44f18. Steps 4, 5 still ready; Step 8 unblocked from macOS side.
Step 4 done: created 4 Linux platform skills (notification, clipboard, open-url, tts). Committed 7dfa7b7. Step 8 now unblocked. Steps 5, 9, 10 still ready.
Step 5 done: created Android open-url platform skill. Committed 627b5ea. Steps 6 and 7 now unblocked (all platform skills complete).

Step 6 done: rewrote install.sh with OS-aware cross-platform logic. Committed f411329. Tested on Termux: idempotent, correct symlinks (7 extensions, 16 skills), config at ~/.config/rho/config, brain untouched. Steps 7 and 8 now ready.

Step 7 done: all 5 rho scripts now source ~/.config/rho/config, use portable shebangs, and guard termux-* commands behind RHO_PLATFORM checks. Committed 393c1fd. Tested on Termux: rho-status shows platform/dir from config, falls back to defaults without config. Steps 8, 9, 10 remaining.

Step 8 done: platform setup.sh scripts created for macOS and Linux. macOS checks built-in tools (osascript, pbcopy, say, open). Linux checks notify-send, clipboard (X11/Wayland-aware), xdg-open, espeak with distro install hints. Also fixed critical bug in cleanup_old() where rm -rf followed symlinks and deleted repo files. Committed 2ebdb79. Steps 9 (README) and 10 (verification) remaining.

Step 9 done: README rewritten for cross-platform. Three install paths (macOS/Linux, Android bootstrap, Android manual). Platform capabilities table, updated project structure with platforms/, configuration section, contributing guide. Bootstrap URL updated to platforms/android/bootstrap.sh. Committed 91f8a40. Step 10 (verification) remaining.

All 10 steps of cross-platform implementation complete. Final step (verification) found and fixed 2 bugs in install.sh: (1) empty dirs without SKILL.md were being symlinked, (2) broken symlinks survived cleanup. All 8 acceptance criteria pass on Termux. 11 commits total. Ready for push when requested.
All 10 cross-platform steps complete. 11 commits. Verified on Termux. platforms/ structure with android/macos/linux, OS-aware install.sh, portable scripts, updated README. Ready for validation.

README lists 3 nonexistent core skills (code-assist, pdd, rho-validate) in skills table and project structure tree. These never existed in the repo. Fix: remove those 3 rows from skills table, remove those 3 entries from project structure (keep only skills/update-pi/). All other checks pass.

Fixed validation failure: removed 3 nonexistent core skills (code-assist, pdd, rho-validate) from README skills table and project structure. Committed 582901d. All 10 steps complete, 12 commits total.
All checks pass: 9 scripts syntax OK, 21 skills valid, install.sh idempotent, 7 extensions + 13 skills correct, all 8 ACs pass, YAGNI/KISS clean, 12 conventional commits. Ready for push.

All 12 commits already in place (f749896..582901d). No new changes to commit. Cross-platform implementation complete and validated. Branch is 12 commits ahead of origin/main, ready for push when requested.

Cross-platform implementation complete. 12 commits (f749896..582901d): platforms/ structure with android/macos/linux skills, OS-aware install.sh, portable scripts, updated README. All validated on Termux. Ready for push.
